_comments.health_check_interval_ms: Health check interval in milliseconds (must be > health_check_timeout_ms)
_comments.health_check_timeout_ms: Health check timeout in milliseconds (must be < health_check_interval_ms)
_comments.failure_threshold: Number of consecutive failures before triggering failover (must be >= 1)
_comments.restart_delay_ms: Delay before restarting process in milliseconds
_comments.max_restart_count: Maximum restart count within time window (must be >= 1)
_comments.restart_window_sec: Time window for restart count in seconds
_comments.enable_state_recovery: Whether to recover from checkpoint on restart
_comments.checkpoint_interval_sec: Checkpoint creation interval in seconds (must be > 0 if enable_state_recovery is true)
_comments.enable_leader_election: Enable leader election in distributed environment (Bully algorithm)
